title: verified doctors
text: Every doctors on DocTime platform are BMDC certified. We verify relevant information before the doctor can consult any patient.

title: Instant video consultation
text: Most of our consultations start within 10 minutes of making a payment. The video call is secured with 256-bit encryption.

title: Instant electronics prescription
text: As soon as the consultation is complete, the doctor will provide an electronic prescription for the patient to download either instantly or later.

title: Easy payment options
text: The patient can make a payment online using our secure payment gateway, with options including bKash, Rocket, Nagad, debit cards, credit cards, and more.

title: Better consultation quality
